p: Many studies have indicated that intake of foods with high levels of flavonoids may have the potential to decrease the risk of certain cancers, such as pancreatic, breast, and colon cancers. The treatment of cancer cells is performed with drugs which induce cell cycle arrest or apoptosis. EOs act in chemoprevention and cancer suppression. EOs from different plants have been reported to have anticancer potential against mouth, breast, lung, prostate, liver, colon, and brain cancers, and even against leukaemia [ 25, 26, 27].
